intro: Stelis melanostele, commonly known as the black-stem stelis, is a member of the Orchidaceae family. It is an epiphytic orchid native to tropical regions of Southeast Asia. The plant typically grows on trees or rocks, with its roots anchoring into the substrate. Its leaves are usually dark green and革质 (leathery), and it produces small, fragrant flowers in shades of white and yellow. Stelis melanostele is valued in horticulture for its ornamental appeal and relatively easy care requirements.
